solution.text:
Total no. of outcomes on rolling a pair of dice \(=36\)
No. of outcomes in which the difference between the two number is \(1\) \(=10\)
Sample space :\([(1,2), (2,1), (2,3), (3,2), (3,4), (4,3), (4,5), (5,4), (5,6), (6,5)]\)
Probability \(=\frac{10}{36}\)
\(=\frac{5}{18}\)

content.text: The difference between the two numbers as \(1\)?
